list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add IntelliJ project files for GitHub_Clone_Trail setup
Introduces `.idea` configuration files to support IntelliJ project setup specific to GitHub_Clone_Trail. This includes project settings, module configurations, VCS mappings, and inspection profiles. A `.gitignore` file is also added to exclude unnecessary local files.

task.summary: Default task

Add initial project setup and stock price script
This commit initializes the project with IntelliJ IDEA configuration files and adds a script to download AAPL stock data using yfinance. The configuration files include project settings, inspection profiles, and version control setup. The script retrieves stock data from 2020-01-01 to 2025-01-31.

Add lecture scripts and update project configuration
Added Python scripts for foundational programming concepts (Lecture 2: Building Blocks) and control flow (Lecture 3: Control Flow). Updated IntelliJ IDEA project configuration, including CSV editor settings and workspace adjustments. These changes enhance the structure and extend the project with educational materials.

Add QAN stock price data CSV file
Include historical stock price data for QAN (Qantas) from January to September to support analysis and modeling. This file provides essential financial metrics like open, close, high, and low prices along with trading volume.

Refactor Lecture 3 script and update project metadata.
Commented out unused code in the Lecture 3 Control Flow script for better readability and maintainability. Enhanced project configuration and metadata, including updates to workspace.xml and coverage details.

Refactor Lecture 3 script and update project metadata.
Commented out unused code in the Lecture 3 Control Flow script to improve readability and maintenance. Updated project configuration and metadata, including workspace.xml and coverage details, for better project organization. These changes enhance code clarity and overall project structure.

Remove historical stock price data file for QAN.AX.
Deleted the `qan_stock_price.csv` file containing historical stock prices to reduce repository size and remove unused data. This cleanup improves project maintainability and ensures only relevant files are retained.

"Add file I/O lecture script with examples and placeholders
Introduce `Lec_Fileio.py` to demonstrate file handling concepts, including reading, writing, and using context managers. The script includes commented-out code for examples, auxiliary functions, and a placeholder for the `safe_open` utility function."

"Add file I/O lecture script with examples and placeholders
Introduce `Lec_Fileio.py` to demonstrate file handling concepts, including reading, writing, and using context managers. The script includes commented-out code for examples, auxiliary functions, and a placeholder for the `safe_open` utility function."Add NVDA stock price data and a placeholder text file
This commit introduces a new CSV file containing historical NVDA stock price data and a placeholder text file with basic content. The added data can be used for analysis or reference in future

Add script to analyze Amazon reviews with sentiment and word clouds.
This commit introduces a Python script for processing and analyzing Amazon reviews. It includes functions for text preprocessing, sentiment analysis using NLTK's Vader, and visualizing positive and negative sentiments with word clouds. The script generates results for common words, sentiment classification, and evaluation metrics.

Delete obsolete `.idea` config and NVDA stock price data files.
This commit removes residual `.idea` configuration files and an outdated `nvda_stock_price.csv` file from the project. These files are unnecessary and their removal helps maintain a cleaner and more organized codebase.

Add new lecture script for DataFrames in pandas.
This commit introduces `Lec_pd_Dataframes.py`, a companion script for the lecture on pandas DataFrames. It includes examples for creating Series and DataFrames, modifying indexes and columns, and sorting Series. Placeholder code is added for further expansion and detailed demonstrations.

Add new lecture script for pandas DataFrames.
Introduce `Lec_pd_Dataframes.py`, a companion script for showcasing key pandas DataFrame concepts. Examples include creating Series and DataFrames, modifying indexes and columns, and sorting data. The script also features additional placeholder code for further development.

Add new lecture script for pandas DataFrames.
Introduce `Lec_pd_Dataframes.py`, a companion script for showcasing key pandas DataFrame concepts. Examples include creating Series and DataFrames, modifying indexes and columns, and sorting data. The script also features additional placeholder code for further development.

Add new lecture scripts for pandas CSV and indexing
Introduce `Lec_pd_csv.py` and `Lec_pd_Indexing.py` as companion scripts for lectures on handling CSV files and pandas object indexing respectively. These scripts feature examples for reading/writing CSVs, series handling, and DataFrame indexing methods.

Add new lecture scripts for pandas CSV and indexing
Introduce `Lec_pd_csv.py` and `Lec_pd_Indexing.py` as companion scripts for lectures on handling CSV files and pandas object indexing respectively. These scripts feature examples for reading/writing CSVs, series handling, and DataFrame indexing methods.

Add lecture script for pandas datetime handling
Introduce `Lec_pd_Datetime.py` as a companion script for time-series data handling in pandas. The script includes examples of working with `datetime`, `timedelta`, and pandas datetime features, such as indexing, formatting, and parsing dates. It complements lessons on time-series analysis and data manipulation.

Add tk_utils module with utility functions and tests
Introduce the `tk_utils` package, which includes various utility functions for CSV handling, pretty printing, general tools, and backup operations. Accompanied by initial tests to ensure functionality of core components.

Add tk_utils module with utility functions and tests
Introduce the `tk_utils` package, which includes various utility functions for CSV handling, pretty printing, general tools, and backup operations. Accompanied by initial tests to ensure functionality of core components.

Add tk_utils module with utility functions and tests
Introduce the `tk_utils` package, which includes various utility functions for CSV handling, pretty printing, general tools, and backup operations. Accompanied by initial tests to ensure functionality of core components.

Update datetime print, add libraries, and tweak configs
Added `print(dt_now)` for datetime output in `Lec_pd_Datetime.py`. Included essential library imports in the notebook for visualization and processing. Made minor adjustments to project configuration and version control mappings.

Add IntelliJ project files for GitHub_Clone_Trail setup
Introduces `.idea` configuration files to support IntelliJ project setup specific to GitHub_Clone_Trail. This includes project settings, module configurations, VCS mappings, and inspection profiles. A `.gitignore` file is also added to exclude unnecessary local files.
